item.title: TiGames announces ZOOPUNK for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/tigames-announces-zoopunk-for-pc

  • PC

New game to utilize NVIDIA ACE technology.

F.I.S.T.: Forged in Shadow Torch developer TiGames has announced ZOOPUNK, a new game currently in development for PC.

A demonstration video powered by NVIDIA ACE and GeForce AI PCs and showcasing in-game customization was released as part of the announcement.

“Speak with allies about intel gathered on a mission, and head to the pier to design a new warship that’ll aid Rayton in his war against the Mechanoid Empire,” reads the announcement. “Using locally-hosted Stable Diffusion image generation, request new ship artwork, and adjust its paintjob via Text To Speech inputs, rather than the adjustment of dozens of sliders.”

A release window and additional information was not announced.

Watch the announcement trailer below. Visit the official website here.
